column2: The '&'_(ampersand) is traditional style with two enclosed loops.
column5: The bowl of the '6'_meets the vertical.
column6: The bowl of the '9'_meets the vertical.
column7: The bowl of the lower-case 'b'_is a flattened circle or ellipse.
column8: The bowl of the lower-case 'g'_is a flattened circle or ellipse or ellipse.
column9: The centre bar of the upper-case 'R'_meets the vertical.
column10: The centre vertex of the upper-case 'M'_is on the baseline.
column11: The centre vertex of the upper-case 'W'_has two separate serifs.
column12: The end of the lower-case 'e'_tail is horizontal or nearly horizontal.
column13: The leg of the upper-case 'K'_has two serifs.
column14: The leg of the upper-case 'R'_is straight.
column15: The lower-case 'g'_is single-storey (with or without loop).
column17: The stem of the lower-case 'a'_is straight.
column18: The tail of the lower-case 'y'_is substantially straight.
column19: The top of the '7'_has no serif or bar.
column20: The top of the lower-case 'q'_has a vertical or slightly angled spur (pointed or flat).
column21: The top of the upper-case 'W'_has three upper terminals.
column22: The top storey of the '3'_is a smooth curve.
column23: The top stroke of the upper-case 'Z'_has no upward-pointing serif.
